author: More Perfect Union
description:
A federal judge ruled Google’s search operations are an illegal monopoly — but in a huge loss to consumers (you) the company received the regulatory equivalent of a slap on the wrist.

But, Google is awaiting a ruling for their other illegal monopoly, over advertising, and it could be the last chance to break up the tech giant.

Here’s the thing: Google knows that its monopoly over ad tech hurts consumers. Back in the ‘90s, the company’s founders wrote a paper outlining how search engines funded by ads are inherently biased against users.

Google predicted this would happen nearly 30 years ago — and they profit off of it anyway.
title: Google Founders Admitted Their Monopoly Would Harm You 30 Years Ago
